options.content:
# Vacuum Phases

- 0: initializing
- 1: scanning heap
- 2: vacuuming indexes
- 3: vacuuming heap
- 4: cleaning up indexes
- 5: truncating heap
- 6: performing final cleanup

https://www.postgresql.org/docs/12/progress-reporting.html for more details
